HEADER_TITLE: Get your business to a higher level
HEADER_NAME: Hi! My name is Martijn van Driest
HEADER_PLEASURE_TO_MEET: It's a pleasure to meet you.
PORTFOLIO_DESCRIPTION: Here you can find some of my work.

SERVICES.INFO: I offer a number of services
SERVICES.WEB_DESIGN_INFO: When the consumer visits your website, it gives a first impression of your company.
SERVICES.BRANDING_INFO: Good branding ensures that your brand evokes the right associations with your customers.
SERVICES.VIDEO_EDITING_INFO: With video you ensure a direct connection with the customer and ensure trust.
SERVICES.PACKAGING_DESIGN_INFO: With a good design of your product you will stand out among other products.
SERVICES.PROTOTYPING_INFO: With a good prototype you get a good impression of your web/app design.

ABOUT_ME.DRIVEN_BY_CREATIVITY_INFO: I am a creative person who is always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
ABOUT_ME.MY_NAME: My name is Martijn van Driest and I'm 19 years old.
ABOUT_ME.HOW_I_STARTED_DESCRIPTION: I have been practicing this profession for about 5 years with great pleasure. I have always been interested in Design. I started helping people for social media posts. Since then I started to grow to a higher level and I knew that this would be my job later on.
ABOUT_ME.MY_SPECIALITIES_DESCIPRTION: My best specialty is that I can learn quickly and because of that I can develop ideas better. For example, I learned 3 Adobe programs in 2 years without any prior knowledge. That's how I found out that this is really my passion.
ABOUT_ME.INTRODUCTION: I am a Graphic Designer based in the Netherlands. I have been working in the field of design since the age of 12. I have a passion for creating beautiful and functional designs. I am a creative person who likes to work with people and to create something that makes them happy.
ABOUT_ME.STUDIOUS_DESCRIPTION: I am a studious person who likes to learn new things and to keep up with the latest trends. I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and knowledge.
ABOUT_ME.DRIVEN_DESCRIPTION: I am a driven person who likes to work hard and to achieve my goals. I am always looking for new ways to improve myself and my work.

HOW_I_HELP.TITLE: How can I help?
HOW_I_HELP.DESCRIPTION: I can help you with all kinds of design projects. I can help you with web design, packaging design, branding, video editing and more. I can also help you with your business needs, marketing and social media.

CONTACT.MAKE_CONTACT_LONG: Lets get in touch and discuss your project.
CONTACT.SUCCESS: Your message has been sent. Thank you for contacting me.
CONTACT.ERROR: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
